title: [TensorFlow Mechanics 101]: Add conv layers to this tutorial
body_html: It seems the tutorial in TensorFlow Mechanics 101 has more beautiful structure in coding, and as it currently only contains fully connected layers. Is it a good addition to include conv layers ? If so, please leave a short comment and I'll submit a pull request soon.
